trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around May 15th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking up in the sky( to look for the planet Nibiru and at the stars) when I seen an orb flying across the sky and the ten minutes later there was another one going in the same direction as the first I HAVE NEVER seen a ufo until that night. It freaked me out but I already knew of ufos from the bible and such but never experienced this and I look up at the stars at least once a week and I have never seen this before. after 37 years of nothing I was finally shown. I told the three witnesses to look up and they also seen it. I lost sight when my son called my name I looked away and when I told them to look up they also seen the second one. I shown 4 people that night and they all seen it.
Summary: Looked like orb flying straight line across the sky I seen one, then like ten minutes later there was a different one, like it was following the first one.
